issues.description: The method for retrieving the quantity of a StockIngredient is named 'retrieveQuantity' in the template repository but 'getQuantity' in the solution repository. This inconsistency in method naming for the same conceptual entity (the getter for the quantity attribute) could confuse students, as they may struggle to map the non-standard name in the template to the standard name in the solution, increasing cognitive load when transitioning between artifacts.
issues.suggested_fix: Update the method name in the template repository from 'retrieveQuantity' to 'getQuantity' to align with standard Java getter conventions and ensure consistency with the solution repository, helping students build a coherent mental model without unnecessary renaming conflicts.
